name: INSPIRATION IV - Prologue
description:
Your mission is to pilot INSPIRATION IV Rover and explore the area where you have landed and collect samples of the substrate to be later analyzed in order to find organic molecules.

CONTROLS

HOW TO PLAY
  1. Download inspiration-iv-windows.zip
  2. Extract the contained files
  3. Run INSPIRATION.exe

PRESS KIT You will find trademarks and screenshots available to download in the Download section

An alternative version of the logo is available as a round logo. If you need it you can contact us at Twitter and ask for it.



Music & SFXs created at Spiff Studios ® - Dolby Atmos Music ® Certified Studio
